titleStmt.title: The kernell of Christianity containing a short yet full summe of our communion with Christ. / By Mr Francis Peck Mr of Arts, minister of the word and pastor at Hartford. Imprimatur Iohn Downame.
titleStmt.author: Peck, Francis, d. 1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for Iohn Bellamy at the signe of the three Golden-Lyons near the Royall-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
